import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import FormControl from "@material-ui/core/FormControl"; import Radio from "@material-ui/core/Radio"; import RadioGroup from "@material-ui/core/RadioGroup"; import FormLabel from "@material-ui/core/FormLabel"; import FormControlLabel from "@material-ui/core/FormControlLabel"; import "./Information.css"; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ formControl: { alignContent: "left", }, selectEmpty: { marginTop: theme.spacing(2), }, TextFieldControl: { marginLeft: theme.spacing(1), }, formControlTitle: { margin: theme.spacing(1), minWidth: 140, }, })); export default function Information({ data, setInformation }) { const classes = useStyles(); const { firstName, lastName, age, idCard, title, gender } = data; return (

ข้อมูลส่วนบุคคล

{/* คำนำหน้าชื่อ */} setInformation({ ...data, title: e.target.value }) } /> {/* ชื่อ */} setInformation({ ...data, firstName: e.target.value }) } /> {/* นามสกุล */} setInformation({ ...data, lastName: e.target.value }) } /> {/* เพศ */} เพศ setInformation({ ...data, gender: e.target.value }) } > } label="ชาย" /> } label="หญิง" /> {/* อายุ */} setInformation({ ...data, age: e.target.value }) } /> {/* เลขบัตรประจำตัวประชาชน*/} setInformation({ ...data, idCard: e.target.value }) } />
); }
